a-pagination/defaultPageSize.description: default number of data items per page

a-pagination/hideOnSinglePage.description: Whether to hide pager on single page

a-pagination/pageSize.description: number of data items per page

a-pagination/showQuickJumper.description: determine whether you can jump to pages directly

a-pagination/showSizeChanger.description: determine whether pageSize can be changed

a-pagination/showTotal.description: to display the total number and range

a-pagination/size.description: specify the size of Pagination, can be set to small
